mapper.select: select count(userId) from tbl_user_base where userName=#{userName}
select count(userId) from tbl_user_base where phoneNo=#{phoneNo}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user_base ( userName, password, phoneNo, state, createTime ) value ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{phoneNo}, 0, now() )
mapper.update: update tbl_user_base set password=#{password} where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select userName as userName, password as password, gender as gender, birthday as birthday, avatar as avatar, nickname as nickname, phoneNo as phoneNo, state as state, remarks as remarks, lastLoginTime as lastLoginTime, createTime as createTime, updateTime as updateTime from tbl_user_base where state = 0 and (userName=#{acount} or phoneNo=#{account})
